resources.string: Strength is used to measure physical power.\n Your strength modifier will also apply to the following check:\n Athletics

Dexterity is used to measure agility.
 Your dexterity modifier will also apply to the following checks:
 Acrobatics
 Initiative
 Sleight of Hand
 Stealth

Intelligence is used to measure reasoning and memory.
 Your intelligence modifier will also apply to the following checks:
 History
 Investigation
 Nature
 Religion

Wisdom is used to measure perception and insight.
 Your wisdom modifier will also apply to the following checks:
 Animal Handling
 Insight
 Medicine
 Perception
 Survival

Charisma is used to measure force of personality.
 Your modifier will also apply to the following checks:
 Deception
 Intimidation
 Performance
 Persuasion
Constitution is used to measure endurance.\n This doesn\'t influence any other checks.
